string-array.name: qr_scan_messages
string-array.item: Hold up the code, I’ll do the rest 🪄
Ready when you are — just flash the code 👀
Aim at the QR and let the sats flow ⚡
Point to pay. Zap complete in seconds ⚡️
Catch the QR if you can 🕹️
Psst… got a QR? I’ll take it from here 😉
Show me your best QR pose 📸
Feed me QR codes, I’m hungry 😋
Let’s dance — bring the QR closer 💃
